simplified: 三个臭皮匠，赛过一个诸葛亮

pronunciation.pinyin: sān gè chòu pí jiang , sài guò yī gè zhū gě liàng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sai4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4

details.simplified: 三个臭皮匠，赛过一个诸葛亮
details.traditional: 三個臭皮匠，賽過一個諸葛亮

meanings.value: three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius ; fig. collective wisdom
wisdom of the masses exceeds that of any individual
